name: flipbook-js
description: A plugin built on javascript which allows users animate to a book with flippable pages
author: Taufiq

scripts.build: pnpm lint && pnpm scss && rollup -c && cp src/FlipBook.d.ts dist/flipbook.d.ts
scripts.minify: cleancss -o dist/flipbook.min.css dist/flipbook.css && terser dist/flipbook.umd.js -o dist/flipbook.umd.min.js --compress --mangle && terser dist/flipbook.esm.js -o dist/flipbook.esm.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.demo: cp dist/flipbook.umd.min.js demo/flipbook.umd.min.js && cp dist/flipbook.min.css demo/flipbook.min.css
scripts.prerelease: pnpm lint:check && pnpm test:all && pnpm build && pnpm verify:demo
scripts.release:patch: pnpm prerelease && npm version patch && pnpm release:publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm prerelease && npm version minor && pnpm release:publish
scripts.release:major: pnpm prerelease && npm version major && pnpm release:publish
scripts.release:publish: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm lint:check && pnpm test:all && pnpm build
